form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Immigration and Naturalization Service, Form OF-230 ( (Rev. 6-82)

full_text: Sreened by NARA, 9/25/2023 Form OF-230 (Rev. 6-82) TSS-229 (1/83) DEPARTMENT OF STATE B it r APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insuffici- ent room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $25.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry CO uld be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation 1. th Family name % First name and middle name LIU, CHI 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) NIL 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) 4. Date of birth 5.4# Age 6. ### Place of birth Year A Month E Day (Country) (Province) it (City or town) 1914 OCT. 8 71 CHINA CANTON DAPU 7. Nationality 8. 1880 Sex 9. Marital status () Vets ## R.O.C. * Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Male Female * Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address NIL 3/F-2, 135, SEC. 1, HSIN-HAIRD. TAIPEI, TAIWAN. 12. Name and address of wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) WIFE: QIAN, SHU-JUN Date and place of marriage 13. Names, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children DAVD LIU 2519 SALFBUSH PALMDALE CA U. S. A. 93550 BIRTH DATE: 1937 OCT.21 14. 11213 15. Final address in the United States Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow me to the United States. 2519 SALFBUSH PALMDALE CA U. S. A. 93550 16. 17. Person you intend to join (Give name, address and Name and address of sponsoring person or organization relationship, if any) (If different from 16) SON: DAVD LIU ADD: 2519 SALFEUSH PALMDALE CA. U.S.A. 93550 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height NIL BLACK FIVE feet FIVE inches (b) RAME Color of eyes (d) Complexion 20. Purpose in going to the United States BLACK YELLOW To live with my son together 21. 22. 23. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) Intended port of entry Do you have a ticket to Permanently stay. Los Angeles. final destination? YES THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
